and knit one stitch in cc p1 in mc use the next cc filament from the bundle and knit the next cc stitch each of the 8 knit stitches in cc of one motif should be worked with a different filament from the bundle each filament from the bundle should be used once and only once across one motif use longer filaments for needle 1 and shorter for needle 2 do not make knots when attaching the cc filaments
